name: Nostra
introduce: Nostra is a one-stop DeFi solution built on Starknet where users can lend, borrow, and swap crypto. The Nostra Liquidity Layer consists of Nostra Money Market, UNO (the first Starknet-native stablecoin), and Nostra Swap (stablecoin DEX). Integrating all three products enables permissionless access to liquid crypto assets for users at any time for any purpose, with minimal impact on price.
